Class PolygonVect

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Shape

    public class PolygonVect
extends Polygon
    The Class PolygonVect uses ArrayList to keep the 2D points
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
